data.title: Music Boxes
data.meta_description: The Music Box is a Hardmode accessory and furniture item that can be purchased from the Wizard for 10 GC. When the Music Box is equipped in an accessory slot, it will record the currently playing in-game music after a randomized delay. This includes tracks being played by other Music Boxes. Once recorded, it will change into one of the Music Boxes listed below. A record soundhttps://terraria.wiki.gg/wiki/File:Item_166.wav alerts the player about a completed recording. Most Music Box variants can only be obtained by recording in-game music with the exception of Music Box (Journey's End), which can be bought directly from the Princess for 10 GC after defeating the Moon Lord.
